title.rendered: Children celebrate the festival of lights-Diwali

content.rendered: Children from the Mission Education centre True Light International celebrated the event with much joy and gaiety. The teachers spoke about the mythology associated with the festival and the importance of it. The children burst some crackers. Sweets were also distributed to the children. the children had much fun and were very happy to celebrate the festival.
